# PREFLIGHT CHECKLIST
## 1. Power supply
## 1.1. Battery units
- Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the substation unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the APC unit's Main Breaker is toggled on. - Check the APC unit's current Load* (W).
## 1.2. AME generator unit.
- Check that the AME core is properly shielded. - Check that the AME controller unit is anchored to the floor. - Check the AME controller unit Fuel Status. - Check the AME controller unit Injection Amount. - Toggle Injection.
## 2. Atmospherics
## 2.1. Distribution Loop
- Check that the gas mixer is set to the correct mixing ratio (21% Oxygen, 79% Nitrogen). - Check that the gas mixer is set to 101kPa. - Enable gas mixer.
## 2.2. Waste Loop
- Enable waste loop disposal valve. (located at the atmospherics room)
## 3. Other checks
- Check that all 4 gyroscopes is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled.
## Sidenotes
* - Starhaven-class service shuttle are equipped with eight APC units that can be used to appraise the ship's total power consumption. Unmodified Starhaven-class-class ship requires 68 kW of power to remain operational.
